additional_info:
Furniture, Technique, Internet, Window guards, corner, pass-through, Heating system: central, Hot water: gas 
 For sale is this superb 2 bedroom furnished apartment located on the first floor of a beautiful newly built house in a prestigious and ecologically clean part of Tbilisi – Sairme Hill. 
Master bedroom has a fantastic view on a park.
Second bedroom is cozy and convenient.
Living room with space for dining is bright and benefits from an attractive private garden.
Eat-in kitchen has an access to the garden and is equipped with brand new oven, refrigerator, dishwasher and washing machine.
All beddings, furniture, kitchen equipment and plasma TV is brand new and have never been used.
